attributes.review: The app literally does nothing for me!! It is basically an extension of the website and is really difficult to use. Not quite user friendly...which I mean isn’t surprising. It also look forever to download hopefully it will simple enough to delete it.
attributes.title: That’s it???

attributes.review: This app is ABSOLUTELY POINTLESS! took so long to download i even forgot i had planned to download it in the first place. Even when it finally downloaded nothing seemed to work at all? what is even the point? Theres no point of this being on the app store. absolutely pointless.
attributes.title: The worst app i have ever downloaded

attributes.review: I open the app and it takes an HOUR to load it’s RIDICULOUS...  then it goes up and everything is blurry and says horrible words on it. I think you guys have a problem with a hacker this is horrible and a WASTE OF SPACE ON THE APP STORE ✨. Anyways I’m incredibly sad I just wanted to follow our very interesting president.
attributes.title: Just no...

attributes.review: This app has been glitching so much and I honestly think it’s because I’m Mexican. This app has also caused me to fall into deep depression an due to that I have to go to therapy 5 days every week. And every time I see this app’s logo it brings back all the trauma but today I am facing my fear to warn people about this racist app!
attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.review: This app made my phone go to different apps when I didn’t even go to those apps and when I went to the app it started alarming and making some annoying loud noises which gave me a migraine and I had to go to the hospital because of that definitely not recommended
attributes.title: This app

attributes.review: This app will steal your animal crossing villagers identity and your bells!!! As soon as I downloaded my pet dragon went to Wendy’s to get me a new villager for my island but then suddenly trump slapped me! I can’t believe this happened because all my bells and nook miles have suddenly disappeared! My dragon is very depressed and says trump raided my island and sexually abused him!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.review: It messed up my phone now it glitches and turns my phone off every min or two and the app doesn’t work it make a weird noise when I put it on and makes my phone weird...... don’t recommend don’t getttttt it it ruins your phone really bad I might have to get a new phone
attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: This app could sense that i was possibly going to vote for Biden this year and every time I went on the app it kicked me off. This app also runs extremely slow and is not worth your time. Overall it’s less then one star. I wish I could put it in the negatives.
attributes.title: Awful!!
